etomica.graph.model.impl

Class BitmapOfLongVector

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.graph.model.impl.AbstractBitmap
      • etomica.graph.model.impl.BitmapOfLongVector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Bitmap, java.lang.Comparable<Bitmap>

    public final class BitmapOfLongVector
extends AbstractBitmap
    Transparent implementation of arbitrarily large bitmaps based on an array of long values.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface etomica.graph.model.Bitmap
